hints.title: Dobrushin Contraction (Established)
hints.content:
7323: :label: thm-dobrushin-established
7324: 
7325: The full operator contracts in the **discrete status metric** $d_{\text{status}}$ (number of alive/dead changes):
7326: 
7327: $$
7328: \mathbb{E}[d_{\text{status}}(S_{t+1}, \pi_{\text{QSD}})] \leq \gamma \cdot d_{\text{status}}(S_t, \pi_{\text{QSD}}) + K
7329: $$
7330: 
7331: where $\gamma = (1 - \lambda_{\text{clone}}\tau) < 1$.
